duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for delivery and pickup of containers to and/or from customer locations, ensuring an effective and incident-free delivery or pickup experience.
Maintaining excellent rapport with customers, providing an industry-leading customer experience.
Utilize patented hydraulic lift system to deliver customer containers.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, CDL A or B, and at least 3 months of experience employed as a CDL driver.
